name: Traps
display_help: Traps are devices and gadgets you construct to cripple your foes. By using them strategically, you can gain a great tactical advantage. Traps include ambush devises, as well as gadgets that can be constructed to aid you and your allies.
power_short_helps: Place Trap: Ranged (AoE), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe -Res(All), -DEF
Place Drone: PBAoE, Team +DEF, +Res(Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Place Trap: PBAoE Foe Choke, Vomit, -Regen, -Recharge
Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)
Place Mine: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Knockback
